exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
[Focus] Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.

In environment f : bool -> bool -> bool x : bool l : lb y : bool m : lb IH : forall n : nat, length l <= n -> length (y :: m) <= n -> length (lb_pointwise l (y :: m)) <= n n : nat Hlen_l : S (length l) <= n Hlen_m : S (length m) <= n Unable to unify "S ?M1444 <= S ?M1445" with "S (length (lb_pointwise l m)) <= n".

original: revert n. induction l as [|x l IH]. - simpl. intros n Hlen_m Hlen. auto. - destruct m as [|y m]. -- simpl. intros n Hlen_l Hlen. auto. -- simpl. intros n Hlen_l Hlen_m. apply le_n_S. apply IH. ++ apply le_S_n in Hlen_l. auto. ++ apply le_S_n in Hlen_m. auto.
